section.p: Later that day, you are approached by a member of the household of Lord Elbistan.
'My lord is grateful,' he says. 'I am to teach you something about the ancient game of bokh.'

Bokh is a chess-like game of strategy, beloved of the masked lords of Uttaku.
Note that you have gained one additional circle of bokh mastery
(i.e. if you have no skill in bokh, note that you are now a 1st Circle Master of bokh).
